about.description1: Hello World! I am Louis, a Full stack developer with a unique set of skills that will bring a fresh perspective to your team.
about.description2: My coding skills are rock solid, from front-end design to back-end development, I have a knack for creating user-friendly interfaces and writing efficient, bug-free code. I'm well-versed in a variety of programming languages, including TypeSricpt, JavaScript, Python, PHP, HTML/CSS and technology such as: MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS, Wordress Core etc.
